definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: The hydration mechanism of matrix materials adulterated admixtures was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探討了摻入外加劑後基體材料的水化機理。

sentences.english: Both light and temperature, with the addition of wind speed and other factors, can influence panel output.
sentences.chinese: 光和溫度，外加風速和其他因素都能影響面板的輸出。

sentences.english: Getting the job means receiving wages plus room and board.
sentences.chinese: 接受這份工作意味着得到工資外加膳宿。

sentences.english: The enzyme was used during the malting process for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 首次利用外加酶法輔助麥芽製造。

sentences.english: The Application of concrete admixtures is more and more with the development building trades.
sentences.chinese: 隨着建築行業的發展，砼外加劑應用也越來越多。

sentences.english: Tom:I'd like two chicken combos and an order of fried chicken wings.
sentences.chinese: 我要兩個雞腿漢堡套餐，外加一份炸雞翅。

sentences.english: I sent her a birthday card, together with a bunch of flowers.
sentences.chinese: 我送了她一張生日卡，外加一束花。

sentences.english: The research then focuses on the mechanism which a pivot can resist external torques at arbitrary position.
sentences.chinese: 其次探討當此轉軸靜止時抵抗外加扭矩之機制。

sentences.english: Many different types and sizes of anodes are available for use in impressed current system.
sentences.chinese: 有各種類型和大小的陽極可用於外加電流系統。

sentences.english: My heart leaps and I feel dizzy whenever I see you.
sentences.chinese: 每次見到妳，我就小鹿亂撞外加頭暈目眩。

sentences.english: France is the most expensive dish Egan, the dishes are fried steak plus potatoes wire.
sentences.chinese: 法國最名貴的菜是鵝肝，家常菜是炸牛排外加土豆絲。

sentences.english: An egg-white spinach omelet with sliced avocado and some whole-grain toast will do the trick!
sentences.chinese: 蛋白菠菜蛋卷外加鱷梨片兒和全麥土司最好了。

sentences.english: Extra anode was added to make up a triode.
sentences.chinese: 外加陽極就構成了三極管。

sentences.english: I enjoy beetroot and kale smoothies with a dash of turmeric and ground pepper.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡甜菜根和甘藍奶昔，外加少許薑黃和胡椒粉。

sentences.english: The heat wave along with occasional power-cuts had made life miserable here.
sentences.chinese: 熱浪外加偶爾停電，使得這裏的生活相當痛苦。

sentences.english: The acquisition price was approximately five million dollars in cash plus an earn-out based on future operating performance.
sentences.chinese: 併購價接近五百萬現金外加未來的營運盈餘。

definition: plus/to put in/to add/to add on/to add into/in addition/on top of that
take-out (fast food)/(outer part of) tire/as well/besides/into the bargain/outer zone
apart from this/in addition to this
besides/except/to get rid of (sb)/(math.) to divide
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
